data.message: That's a good idea i need help to do that ok,thank you

replies.message: We're glad you think so, Dianne! Thank you for your feedback. -Sarah

Is facebook only looking for positive feedback? Look at it in the realistic scene. Most people check facebook via and app or mobile. And if the cell phone services are interrupted nobody is checking in. I hope this is taken into consideration.

It won't be able to help everyone because of service interruptions and maybe an inability to charge phones. It WILL be able to help some people. In an large emergency, even 1% can be a sizable number. It's a great idea and I appreciate it. Thank you, Facebook.
